claims.object: Signal derived from the dynamic cellular microenvironment

surface_layer.definition: A signal originating from mechanical forces within a cell's surroundings.

deep_layer.mechanism: Mechanical signals trigger intracellular pathways affecting gene expression and cell function.
deep_layer.origin: Generated by cell interactions with the extracellular matrix and neighboring cells.

epistemic_metadata.source: Static and Dynamic: Evolving Biomaterial Mechanical Properties ...
